value.title: How to create a container image with Docker | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to create a container image to run applications with Docker. You’ll see how to create a folder inside a container and create a script to execute it.    For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips  Get started with 12 months of free services
